info.title: Auth REST API Documentation and Client
info.description: This is the REST API documentation for the BridgeIt Auth Service.  It's also a dynamic client that you can use to exercise the API and try it out.

get.description: Retrieve a time-limited access_token. This token is required to use other Voyent services.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account under which one or more realms are managed.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this token and all other service resources are managed.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: A valid username for an account in this realm.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password associated with this username.

200.description: Returns a single, specific record uniquely identified by the resourceId

AccessToken.description: A record containing and access_token the it's expiry time

access_token.description: A unique token used for security when accessing BridgeIt services.

expires_in.description: The time when the access_token expires.  Expressed in Unix time (the number of milliseconds since midnight on January 1, 1970.
